HomePage.title: Building Better
HomePage.subtitle: 67 Design & Build supports public and private project owners across Cameroon: studies, design, construction, and 360° maintenance.
HomePage.about_title: Every project is a unique adventure
HomePage.about_content: We guide our clients from the first idea to the final realization, transforming their spaces with creativity, expertise, and precision. Driven by our core values – professionalism, innovation, quality, commitment, and proximity – our team designs tailor-made, elegant, and durable solutions.
HomePage.service_geo_desc: Soil studies and geotechnical analyses to ensure foundation stability and safety.
HomePage.service_cal_desc: Our team carries out comprehensive structural studies to guarantee stability, durability, and efficiency, regardless of project size.
HomePage.service_cost_desc: Each quotation is based on rigorous analysis and a complete understanding of the project, offering a clear and controlled view of costs.
HomePage.service_work_desc: Each stage is carried out with precision to ensure durable, safe, and standards-compliant structures.
HomePage.service_study_desc: Each project benefits from an integrated approach combining aesthetics, functionality, and sustainability to create harmonious and comfortable spaces to live or work in.
HomePage.service_maintenance_desc: Maintenance ensures the durability, safety, and optimal performance of infrastructures.
HomePage.expertise_desc: Through an approach combining design and construction, we create elegant, functional, and sustainable spaces fully adapted to our clients’ needs.
HomePage.area_services_desc: Shops and retail stores, Shopping centers, Restaurants, cafés and bars, Hotels and hospitality venues, Spas and beauty salons, Leisure and entertainment areas
HomePage.area_pro_desc: Offices and headquarters, Business centers and coworking spaces, Public institutions and administrations, Schools, universities and training centers
HomePage.area_res_desc: Private villas and residences, Residential buildings and apartments, Warehouses and industrial buildings, Garages and storage areas
HomePage.project_desc: Notre approche intégrée allie esthétique, fonctionnalité et durabilité pour créer des espaces qui reflètent votre identité et répondent à vos aspirations.
HomePage.project_saga_desc: Complete interior and exterior renovation, modernized design with an African spirit.
HomePage.project_carino_desc: 10-story mixed-use building (ice cream shop, spa, gym, offices, apartments).
HomePage.cta_desc: Our integrated approach combines aesthetics, functionality, and sustainability to create spaces that reflect your identity and fulfill your aspirations.

About.company_description: 67 Design & Build is a Cameroonian civil engineering and integrated construction company, recognized for its technical rigor and architectural vision.
About.approach_description: We support our clients from design to maintenance through an integrated 'Design & Build' approach.
About.study_description: We analyze each project in detail to define a clear, reliable, and cost-controlled vision.
About.plan_description: We coordinate resources, schedules, and logistics for smooth, efficient execution.
About.build_description: Our teams deliver with precision, quality, and full compliance with standards and deadlines.
About.maintain_description: We ensure the durability of your assets through preventive and corrective 360° maintenance.
About.team_description: Expert Team: a multicultural group of Italian and Cameroonian professionals combining international expertise with local knowledge.
About.gallery_description: Explore the world of 67 Design & Build through images of our sites, teams, workshops, and design spaces.

Services.services_intro: At 67 Design & Build, we bring together engineering, architecture, and execution to deliver complete and sustainable solutions. Every service is guided by the same principles: quality, precision, and on-time delivery.

Contact.contact_intro: Every project begins with a meeting. Whether you need a technical study, architectural design, full construction, or a maintenance contract, our team is here to listen. We respond to every request with rigor, responsiveness, and professionalism.

SEO.home_description: Civil engineering and architectural design company in Cameroon. Studies, construction and 360° maintenance for lasting infrastructures.
SEO.services_description: Explore our services: design studies, construction, interior design, roads & utilities, and 360° maintenance for lasting performance.
SEO.about_description: 67 Design & Build, a leading civil engineering and construction firm. A multicultural team blending international expertise and local mastery.
SEO.projects_description: Explore our featured projects: Saga Africa and Le Carino. Each showcases technical rigor, design excellence, and sustainability.
SEO.contact_description: Tell us about your project. Whether design, construction, or maintenance — our team responds within 72 hours with a tailored proposal.
